title: The End Is Near
description:
A break in the case allows law enforcement to close in on, and ultimately catch, Tony at last. After a harrowing detox in jail, Tony fights for a sentence he feels is justified before heading off to prison to do his time.

Hooked is an Apple Original podcast, produced by Campside Media. Listen and follow on Apple Podcasts.

Apple.co/hooked
